thread.title: Suncor Offers to Acquire Remaining Shares in Canadian Oil Sands
thread.title_full: Suncor Offers to Acquire Remaining Shares in Canadian Oil Sands - Bloomberg Business

author: James Herron
title: Suncor Offers to Acquire Remaining Shares in Canadian Oil Sands
text:
Suncor Energy Inc. offered to acquire all outstanding shares of Canadian Oil Sands Ltd. for about C$4.3 billion ($3.3 billion).
Under the terms of the offer, each shareholder in Calgary-based Canadian Oil Sands will receive 0.25 of a Suncor share. Including the companyâ€™s estimated outstanding net debt of C$2.3 billion as of June 30, the total transaction value is about C$6.6 billion, Suncor said in a statement Monday.
